name: US Real Estate
description: Default configuration for US residential real estate transactions — purchase, title, mortgage, closing, and inspections

documentTypes.name: Appraisal Report
documentTypes.description: Property appraisal — market value determination for lending

references.title: USPAP — Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice
Fannie Mae Form 1004 (Uniform Residential Appraisal Report)

appraisedValue.description: Appraised market value (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

salePrice.description: Sale price (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

approachesUsed.description: Valuation approaches used (Sales Comparison, Cost, Income)

documentTypes.name: Closing Disclosure (CD)
documentTypes.description: TRID Closing Disclosure — final settlement statement with all costs and credits

salePrice.description: Sale price (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

totalClosingCosts.description: Total closing costs (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

buyerClosingCosts.description: Buyer's total closing costs (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

sellerClosingCosts.description: Seller's total closing costs (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

loanAmount.description: Loan amount (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

monthlyPayment.description: Monthly principal & interest payment (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

cashToClose.description: Cash to close from buyer (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

sellerProceeds.description: Net proceeds to seller (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

documentTypes.name: Contact Information
documentTypes.description: Phone, email, and mailing address for a party

documentTypes.name: Deed
documentTypes.description: Property deed — warranty deed, quitclaim deed, special warranty deed

vestingType.description: Vesting / How title is held (e.g. tenants in common, joint tenants)

legalDescription.description: Full legal description of the property (metes and bounds, lot/block, or plat reference)

parcelNumber.description: Assessor Parcel Number (APN) or Tax ID number

consideration.description: Consideration / purchase price (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

bookPage.description: Recording book and page number (e.g. Book 1234, Page 567)

documentTypes.name: Driver's License / Government ID
documentTypes.description: Government-issued identification: Driver's License, Passport, or State ID

issuingState.description: Issuing state (2-letter abbreviation, e.g. CA, NY, TX)

address.description: Residential address as printed on ID

documentTypes.name: HOA Documents
documentTypes.description: Homeowners Association documents — CCRs, bylaws, financials, disclosures

monthlyDues.description: Monthly HOA dues (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

specialAssessments.description: Any pending or recent special assessments

reserves.description: HOA reserve fund balance (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

documentTypes.name: Home Inspection Report
documentTypes.description: Professional home inspection report — structural, mechanical, plumbing, electrical

majorDefects.description: Major defects or safety concerns found

roofCondition.description: Roof condition and estimated remaining life

ssn.description: Social Security Number — 9 digits, format XXX-XX-XXXX (extract with dashes)

monthlyIncome.description: Gross monthly income (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

ssn.description: Social Security Number — 9 digits, format XXX-XX-XXXX (extract with dashes)

monthlyIncome.description: Gross monthly income (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

loanAmount.description: Requested loan amount (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

totalAssets.description: Total assets declared (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

totalLiabilities.description: Total liabilities / debts (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

documentTypes.name: Mortgage Approval / Commitment Letter
documentTypes.description: Lender commitment or pre-approval letter for mortgage financing

approvedAmount.description: Approved loan amount (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

conditions.description: Conditions that must be met prior to closing

documentTypes.name: Property Survey / Plat Map
documentTypes.description: ALTA/NSPS land survey showing boundaries, improvements, and easements

references.title: NSPS — National Society of Professional Surveyors

parcelNumber.description: Assessor Parcel Number (APN) or Tax ID number

lotSize.description: Lot size / area (in acres or sq ft)

boundaryDescription.description: Property boundary details / metes and bounds

documentTypes.name: Property Tax Record
documentTypes.description: County property tax records — assessed value, tax amounts, payment status

parcelNumber.description: Assessor Parcel Number (APN) or Tax ID number

owner.description: Property owner name per tax records

assessedValue.description: Total assessed value (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

landValue.description: Assessed land value (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

improvementValue.description: Assessed improvement value (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

annualTax.description: Annual property tax amount (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

documentTypes.name: Purchase Agreement / Contract
documentTypes.description: Real estate purchase and sale agreement between buyer and seller

purchasePrice.description: Purchase price (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

earnestMoney.description: Earnest money deposit amount (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

contingencies.description: List of contingencies (inspection, financing, appraisal, etc.)

sellerConcessions.description: Seller concessions / credits to buyer (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

closingCostsSplit.description: How closing costs are split between parties

documentTypes.name: Title Insurance Policy
documentTypes.description: Title insurance commitment or policy (owner's or lender's)

coverageAmount.description: Coverage amount (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

premium.description: Premium amount (USD, numbers only, no dollar sign)

documentTypes.name: Title Report / Title Search
documentTypes.description: Preliminary title report or title abstract showing ownership history and encumbrances

effectiveDate.description: Effective date of the title search

parcelNumber.description: Assessor Parcel Number (APN) or Tax ID number

liens.description: Outstanding liens (mortgages, tax liens, judgment liens)
